official_title: A bill relating to Governing International Fishery Agreements.

summary.text: Amends the Fishery Conservation Zone Transition Act to: (1) approve specified governing international fishery agreements with the Soviet Union and Taiwan; and (2) extend for 90 days similar agreements with Poland and Spain if their governments and the United States so agree by July 1, 1982.

titles.title: A bill relating to Governing International Fishery Agreements.
